response_hypothesis: over the coming years, the government should emphasize a high level of economic growth.
adapted_hypotheses: We view sustained economic expansion as a fundamental pathway to national resilience and prosperity. [SEP] Our government remains committed to fostering entrepreneurship, innovation, and productivity to drive inclusive growth. [SEP] In the years ahead, we will prioritize job creation, industrial modernization, and integration into the global economy. [SEP] Economic vitality is the engine of development, enabling every sector of society to thrive. [SEP] High and stable economic growth is not merely a target—it is the foundation for our long-term aspirations.

response_hypothesis: over the coming years, the government should emphasize a high level of economic growth.
adapted_hypotheses: We view sustained economic expansion as a fundamental pathway to national resilience and prosperity. [SEP] Our government remains committed to fostering entrepreneurship, innovation, and productivity to drive inclusive growth. [SEP] In the years ahead, we will prioritize job creation, industrial modernization, and integration into the global economy. [SEP] Economic vitality is the engine of development, enabling every sector of society to thrive. [SEP] High and stable economic growth is not merely a target—it is the foundation for our long-term aspirations.

response_hypothesis: over the coming years, the government should focus on ensuring that people have more say about how things are done at their jobs and in their communities.
adapted_hypotheses: The legitimacy of governance depends on how meaningfully people can shape the decisions that affect them. [SEP] We envision a future where citizens have a more active voice in shaping national priorities and public institutions. [SEP] Democratic participation must be renewed at every level—from local councils to international forums. [SEP] Reforming global governance to reflect a wider consensus, including the reexamination of permanent veto powers, is overdue. [SEP] Empowering communities to co-create solutions fosters resilience, equity, and public trust.

question_text: Aims of country: first choice People sometimes talk about what the aims of this country should be for the next ten years. On this card are listed some of the goals which different people would give top priority. Would you please say which one of these you consider the most important?
